snippet: How far Rick Santorum will go this election year will depend in no small part on what Newt Gingrich does from here on.
abstract: News analysis; how far Republican presidential candidate Rick Santorum will go in the race depends in no small part on what rival Newt Gingrich does from here; if Gingrich stays in, Santorum will continue to share the anti-Mitt Romney vote and see his chances dim; if Gingrich drops out, Santorum will still face difficult delegate math in stopping Romney from the nomination.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear and Richard A. Oppel Jr. contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: How far Rick Santorum will go this election year will depend in no small part on what Newt Gingrich does from here on.

headline.seo: Santorum’s Campaign Future Depends on Gingrich
headline.main: Road for Santorum Depends on the Next Move by Gingrich
headline.print_headline: Road for Santorum Depends On the Next Move by Gingrich
